question: Students from disadvantaged families and rural areas are finding it difficult to gat a university education. Some people believw that universities should help them.  To what extent do you agree or diasgree?
text: A poorly is a major problem around the world. It has been observed in many countries that,students who belong to poor families  have difficulties  to an arrange money for their studies.Some people believe that  the education authorities can release  some facilities for them.I agree with a notion to a large extent,my statement will be elaborated further.

Why the poor pupils have thought to survive while studying. To answer it, there are many things needed for education,like rent house, meals,dinner,electricity bills, books.These types of all-expense are quite difficult for  poor pupils to arrange. Therefore, the education system could supply a free  hostel room along with lunch as well as dinner, and free books.For example, in India,the government colleges have all the free facilities for a tribal community.

Furthermore, a university can offer some part-time jobs to these students,towards which they can earn some money for their daily needs.For instance,70% of American pupils do a part-time job in their own campus like in the library, canteen., the idea can be beneficial for  rural children.

On the other hand, we cannot ignore the facilities of  government universities .Nowadays, authorities provide a large amount of a scholarship to all poor as well middle-class children for their all needs, they have a free hostel including meals.Every year Canadian government supplies 500 dollars per student.

In conclusion,it has been  accounted that tribal children have difficulties surviving while education.I believe  that this situation can be solved by the authorities.Hence, poor pupils can complete their studies without difficulties.
